title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Challenges and Framework Design in Problem-Based Learning (PBL)

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can specifically analyze at least three challenges (social dynamics, knowledge gaps, assessment design) that arise during PBL implementation.
Learners can design a PBL framework tailored to language education contexts in five or more stages.
Learners can propose three strategies to facilitate PBL activities in asynchronous LMS-based environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
